info.name: Carved Rock Fitness
info.description:
Update the variables tab with:

- your server URL
    - if you're using Github Codespaces, don't forget to set your API port to public
- your token from the [token generator](https://salmon-coast-0e491fa10.4.azurestaticapps.net/authentication) (will need to be updated every 5 minutes)
- don't forget to save the collection before running any tests to propogate the variable changes!
